item.title: GENERAL CANNABIS CORP S-1
item.description: GENERAL CANNABIS CORP, which is in the Medicinal Chemicals & Botanical Products [2833] industry, SEC S-1 filing on May 10, 2021 had 32556 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: stock - 469 instances 2020 - 405 instances common - 343 instances shares - 339 instances may - 332 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
